The assignment in the course "Getting and Cleaning Data" provides raw data. This data is transformed towards a final data set. This content of this final data set is described in the assignment.

The file run_analysis.R contains the code used to obtain the final data from the raw data. 

In the file CodeBook.Rmd is described how the final data is obtained from the raw data. The code used in run_analysis.R is shown and accompanied by explanation. Also more information about the data and variables is available.
